response.overview: He who has no brains has good legs, the saying goes, but Hercules has a razor-sharp mind, so he has other buffoons running for him. One is the nephew of a general and the other is a special minister. As a special person, he makes bribes and of course gets paid. But then he meets the minister's daughter, who of course has never met him. However, not knowing that the girl is his daughter, he suggests that she talk to the minister to find her a job.
response.title: O myalopolis
